name: Staging Demo Team
googleGroup: Document Evidence Service - Test and Development
landingMessage: You can use this link to upload the requested evidence we need to process your application. Please make sure all images are clear.
slaMessage: Thank you for submitting your evidence. We will be in touch within 5 days to progress your request.

name: Development Housing Team
landingMessage:
Thank you for your Right to Buy application.

We are currently undertaking some initial checks to confirm if you are eligible to purchase under the Scheme. The Council is required to send you our response within the next four weeks (or eight weeks if you have not been a Hackney Council tenant for the minimum number of qualifying years).

In order to make our decision, we need to see the documents requested no later than 5 working days from the date of this communication. If you will require further time please contact us at your earliest convenience.

If you are unable to provide the information required your Right to Buy will be denied at this time.

An application pack from Hackney Council will also have contained booklets and information about the Right to Buy scheme and how it works.
If you did not obtain the pack application from the council the booklets can be found on the Hackney website at any time https://hackney.gov.uk/buying-your-council-home
slaMessage: This is the Development Housing Team SLA message

slaMessage:
Thank you for providing the requested information to the Property Sales Team.

We will aim to respond to your enquiry within 3 working days, if you have not received a response within 10 working days please contact us further.

Yours Sincerely, The Property Sales Team

name: Admission and Pupil Benefits

reasons.name: Requesting Document Evidence relating to school application

landingMessage: Good Day, Thank you for submitting your application online. We require additional information. If you have any queries please contact us on  020  8820 7000 Option 3. You can telephone the service Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm
slaMessage: Thank you for submitting additional information. This information will be reviewed and your application will be processed.

name: Housing Management

reasons.name: Change of tenancy - Sole to Joint application

landingMessage: Please note, by providing the supporting documents, you are declaring that to the best of your knowledge and belief the information given is correct in every detail. You understand it is an offence to give false or misleading information or to hold back relevant information. You also understand that we will check this information and if any information is found to be false, you may be prosecuted and we may repossess your home. If you are prosecuted and found guilty, you understand that you could be ordered to pay a fine of up to Â£5000. It is your duty to make sure that your application form is honest. You hereby give your consent for Housing Services to carry out a credit reference check and obtain relevant information from the Council and other external agencies. If you have further questions, please contact us.
slaMessage: Thank you very much, our Housing Officer will be in touch shortly once we have reviewed your supporting documents.
